backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing blog posts (with view counts) and updates, exposing admin-only write functions and public read functions for top posts and recent updates, with access control via a mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented feature IDs to their source files, component dependencies, test IDs, and confidence levels for the EchoFactyt project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of each frontend source file, describing the purpose of every component, hook, and style file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, covering background, foreground, card, border, and chart color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA, setting the page title to 'EchoFactyt' and mounting the app at the #root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes the full page layout by rendering all sections (Hero, Updates, CategoryFilter, TrendingFacts, PopularPosts, Top10, Guides, Videos, Quiz, Calculators, Downloads) with shared category filter state.
frontend/src/components/CalculatorsSecti: Section wrapper that renders the GPA Calculator and Screen Time Calculator side-by-side in a two-column responsive grid with a section heading.
frontend/src/components/CategoryFilter.t: Sticky horizontal pill-button filter bar allowing users to filter content by category (All, Technology, School, Health, Entertainment, Daily Life) with active state styling.
frontend/src/components/DownloadsSection: Free downloads section rendering six FreebieCard components (Study Planner, Meal Prep Checklist, Habit Tracker, etc.) in a responsive three-column grid.
frontend/src/components/FactCard.tsx: Renders a styled card displaying a single fact with category badge, title, fact text, and share buttons, with per-category color theming and accent bars.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with brand logo, social media links, an explore navigation list, and a newsletter email signup form on a dark background.
frontend/src/components/FreebieCard.tsx: Card component for a downloadable freebie item that shows a temporary 'Coming Soon' confirmation state when the download button is clicked.
frontend/src/components/GPACalculator.ts: Interactive GPA calculator allowing users to add/remove courses with grade and credit inputs, displaying a live-calculated GPA with a color-coded label.
frontend/src/components/GuideCard.tsx: Displays a step-by-step guide card with a colored header, numbered steps list, and share buttons at the bottom.
frontend/src/components/GuidesSection.ts: Section component that renders a filterable grid of GuideCard components from a hardcoded list of step-by-step guides across multiple categories.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky site header with the EchoFactyt logo, desktop navigation links with smooth-scroll behavior, and a collapsible mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Renders the landing page hero section with a background image, gradient overlay, tagline, CTA buttons (Learn More, Try Now, Watch Video), and a stats row showing site metrics.
frontend/src/components/NewUpdatesSectio: Displays a grid of recently added facts/tips fetched via useGetRecentUpdates, showing relative timestamps and a 'New' badge, with skeleton loading states.
frontend/src/components/PopularPostsSect: Shows the top posts ranked by view count using useGetTopPosts, and increments a post's view count via useViewPost when a card is clicked.
frontend/src/components/Quiz.tsx: A multi-step study-habits quiz with 6 scored questions that calculates a final result tier and displays a share button and reset option on completion.
frontend/src/components/QuizSection.tsx: A section wrapper that renders the Quiz component with a heading and subtitle inside a styled container.
frontend/src/components/ScreenTimeCalcul: An interactive screen time tracker with sliders for phone, computer, TV, and gaming hours that computes a total and displays a wellness assessment label and advice.
frontend/src/components/ShareButtons.tsx: Renders share buttons for X, Facebook, WhatsApp, and a copy-link button, encoding the provided title and URL for each platform.
frontend/src/components/Top10ListCard.ts: Displays a styled top-10 list card with a colored header, numbered items, an expand/collapse toggle for items beyond the first five, and a 'Try Now' button.
frontend/src/components/Top10Section.tsx: Renders a 'Top 10 Lists' section with hardcoded curated lists across categories (School, Technology, Health, Daily Life), filtered by a selected category prop and displayed using Top10ListCard components.
frontend/src/components/TrendingFactsSec: Renders a 'Trending Facts' section with hardcoded mind-blowing facts across multiple categories, filtered by a selected category prop and displayed in a responsive grid of FactCard components.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: A card component that displays a YouTube video thumbnail with a play button, switching to an embedded iframe player on click, along with a category badge and title.
frontend/src/components/VideosSection.ts: Renders a 'Watch & Learn' section with a hardcoded list of YouTube videos displayed as a responsive grid of VideoCard components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) usage, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching top posts, recording post views, and fetching recent updates from the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, configures Tailwind CSS, defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light/dark themes, and declares utility classes for gradients, badges, card hover effects, and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a custom design system with OKLCH-based brand colors (coral, teal, amber), custom fonts (Nunito, Poppins), extended border radii, box shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state manifest for EchoFactyt, a youth-focused facts/tips website, tracking schema version, architectural notes, existing features, and image requirements.
